p: Catherine K. Ettman is Chief of Staff and Director of Strategic Initiatives for the Dean’s Office at Boston University School of Public Health. She is pursuing a PhD in Health Services Research at Brown University School of Public Health. Her research focuses include the social, physical, and economic factors that shape population mental health. She has previously worked in campaign politics in Washington, D.C., and Texas. She is the co-editor of Urban Health (Oxford University Press, 2019).
